thread.title: DJ Khaled Recruits Future, Lil Wayne for Summerfest Cruise
thread.title_full: DJ Khaled Recruits Future, Lil Wayne for Summerfest Cruise

title: DJ Khaled Recruits Future, Lil Wayne for Summerfest Cruise
text:
DJ Khaled Recruits Future, Lil Wayne for Summerfest Cruise Migos and A$AP Rocky also onboard to headline four-day festival-at-sea DJ Khaled has recruited Future, Lil Wayne, Migos and A$AP Rocky to headline his all-star Summerfest cruise. Credit: Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images Entertainment 
Two months after DJ Khaled announced plans to set sail on an all-star Summerfest cruise, the producer has recruited headliners Future , Lil Wayne , Migos and A$AP Rocky to join him on the voyage. Related DJ Khaled Talks Snapchatting Son's Birth, How Muslim Faith Guides Him Hitmaking producer on new memoir, becoming a motivational icon and the importance of self-care 
The festival-at-sea leaves Miami on Friday, June 30th and makes a pair of stops in the Bahamas before returning to Florida on July 3rd, Pitchfork reports . 
In addition to the performances, the Summerfest cruise promises perks like "Meet & Greet Reception," "Themed Parties" and "Partying and mingling up close and personal with the entertainers." 
Get ticket and lodging information for the 18-and-over bash at the Summerfest site . 
In other Khaled news, in addition to his new track "Shining" featuring Jay Z and Beyonce , the producer has been teasing a "top secret video and top secret anthem" featuring Justin Bieber, Chance the Rapper, Migos and Lil Wayne on Instagram . 
The new collaboration and "Shining" are both expected to feature on Khaled's upcoming LP Grateful , the follow-up to 2016's Billboard 200-topping Major Key . More News
